org.apache.gora.mongodb.store

Class MongoMappingBuilder<K,T extends PersistentBase>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gora.mongodb.store.MongoMappingBuilder<K,T>

  • public class MongoMappingBuilder<K,T extends PersistentBase>
extends Object
    A builder for creating the mapper. This will allow building a thread safe MongoMapping using simple immutabilty.
